messages: @LF1310 Thanks for clarifying, can you remember any specific error messages you would've received? Have you tried updating again? ^APM
@FOB_Ellie_ATL Have you made any recent changes or updates? Have you tried a clean boot to troubleshoot this at http://t.co/yxkiO0Mjwx? ^KE
@jasonmccaslin If you have a moment, we'd love to hear your thoughts about our team at http://t.co/or0lUKq2mD. Thank you, Ana! :) ^KE
@logboy104 You can purchase Windows 8.1 at http://t.co/7Vc79I5CYG however; the Windows store update is free. Did that help you, Roger? ^KE
@LF1310 Thanks for clarifying, can you remember any specific error messages you would've received? Have you tried updating again? ^APM
